Key Match Events: Nabil Bentaleb brought down Mabululu inside the box, resulting in a penalty for Angola
Angola scored the equalizer from the penalty spot
Pre-Game Insights: Algeria dominated proceedings right from the word go
Post-Match Reflections: Riyad Mahrez had a quiet evening on the pitch as he was heavily marked by the Angolan defender and could hardly breach their defence
Others: Algeria conceded early in the first half
Angola did a fantastic job in keeping the superior Algerians at bay
